message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $13,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a valuable asset. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $10,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to be closer to my initial offer. How about $12,500?  It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,800. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.

Bob, I truly appreciate your interest and your willingness to negotiate.  I'm going to make one final offer of $12,200.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be a good investment for you. If you don't accept this offer, I'll have to move on to another buyer.
I really like the product, but $12,200 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a final offer of $11,900. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
